parsed_action.reasoning: Run a simple price test aligned with inventory: discount the highest-inventory item (Apparel) to accelerate sell-through, set Electronics as a slightly lower reference price to stay competitive, and take a modest margin on the lowest-inventory Home Goods. This balances profit and velocity while generating data on price elasticity for later adjustments.
